Hello World.

Currently I'm working with Zaya Learning Labs since January-2015 and do freelancing also. In my free time I like to tinker mostly with python or android, but other hobbies are Cycling, Trekking, Photography and learning new things related to programming.
I only take up work which I strongly feel about and always ensure that I contribute more than code. I love working for products or web services based startups and on open source projects.
